description: HeartBeam, Inc., a medical technology company, primarily focuses on telemedicine solutions for the detection and monitoring of cardiac disease outside a healthcare facility setting. The company also focuses on providing diagnostic data to physicians with care management of patients with cardiovascular disease. Its telehealth product comprises a credit card sized electrocardiogram machine and a cloud-based diagnostic software system to address the rapidly growing field of remote patient monitoring. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Santa Clara, California.
